text: Ye it's pretty cheap compared with other programs. And I don't really see any difference. Just limited revenue and your file names are .hiplc

I doubt you'll be making $100k in a year :wink: and if you're happy to have .hiplc then indie seems the ideal choice!
Is there anything you'd like help with, or advice on? Houdini/work wise? Feel like I've not given you much advice lately! You're doing really well with the freelance jobs and tutorial stuff!

Thanks a lot! Well I've had a lot of help from yourself and a few others. And just plain luck as well to be honest! I would like to get into a studio though. I wanna work on Tom Hanks films too! As for advice I can't think of anything right now as everything seems to be slowing down for me. I'm gonna revisit those destro sims soon so I'll definitely need help then!

No problems! Sometimes it is just luck. My first runner job was luck, and then this job in Bournemouth was mainly from who I knew as well.
Have you done yourself a new showreel yet? As that might be good to start plotting out what you want to put into it, and putting a space/temp plate in for the destruction sims, so as soon as they're done, you have a showreel ready to go? And then you can start getting feedback on the stuff that's already in the showreel while you're working on the other sims?
